{"id":1521428951,"question_id":3683,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 4 days","timestamp":1737920088,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"71 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1521428951/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Lexicographically Largest String From the Box I","memory":"169.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string answerString(string word, int numFriends) {//1 <= word.length <= 5 * 10^3\n        if(numFriends ==1)\n            return word;\n        int n = word.size();\n        int maxLength = n-numFriends+1;\n        string res = \"\";\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {\n            res = max(res, word.substr(i, maxLength));\n        }    \n        return res;    \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-lexicographically-largest-string-from-the-box-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
